thread.title: Excellent location, friendly staff, great facilities
thread.title_full: Excellent location, friendly staff, great facilities - Review of Hyatt Centric Times Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: carolinemV5193VD
title: Excellent location, friendly staff, great facilities
text: Myself my husband & 3 friends stayed for 5 nights. The staff were excellent, facilities clean & maintained as new, lifts super quick as was the wifi. The location is excellent, just off Times Square,this gave us the flexibility to get lots done in the time as we could come & go.
